```jsx
import React from 'react'

const HomeContent = () => {
  return (
    <main className="home-page">
      <section className="hero">
        <div className="container">
          <h1>Welcome to HSN Security</h1>
          <p>Professional security services, CCTV, alarms, and IT security solutions.</p>
          <a href="/contact" className="btn">Get a Quote</a>
        </div>
      </section>

      <section className="services-preview container">
        <h2>Our Services</h2>
        <div className="cards">
          <article className="card">
            <h3>CCTV & Surveillance</h3>
            <p>High-quality camera systems with remote monitoring and recording.</p>
          </article>
          <article className="card">
            <h3>Access Control</h3>
            <p>Secure access solutions for offices, buildings, and gated sites.</p>
          </article>
          <article className="card">
            <h3>Alarm Systems</h3>
            <p>Intrusion alarms, motion sensors and 24/7 alerting services.</p>
          </article>
        </div>
      </section>

      <section className="about-preview container">
        <h2>Why Choose Us</h2>
        <p>We combine experienced technicians, reliable equipment and quick support to protect your property and data.</p>
      </section>
    </main>
  )
}

export default HomeContent

```

```jsx
}
```

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="copilot_applyPatch">
<details>
<summary>Tool use: **copilot_applyPatch** • Using "Apply Patch"</summary>

```jsx
import { FaCheckCircle, FaShieldAlt } from "react-icons/fa";

const WhyHSNSecurity = () => {
  const points = [
    "Highly Trained Civil & Ex-Army Personnel",
    "Government Certified & APSAA Registered",
    "24/7 Command & Control Center",
    "Strong Weapon Management System",
    "Trusted by Top Brands & Corporate Clients",
  ];

  return (
    <section className="py-20 bg-white px-6">
      <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-12 items-center">

        {/* Left Icon Block */}
        <div className="text-center md:text-left">
          <FaShieldAlt className="text-7xl text-red-600 mx-auto md:mx-0 mb-4" />
          <h2 className="text-3xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-800">
            Why Choose HSN Security?
          </h2>
          <p className="text-gray-600 mt-4">
            Delivering reliable, premium and compliant security solutions since 2009.
          </p>
        </div>

        {/* Right List */}
        <div className="space-y-6">
          {points.map((p, i) => (
            <div key={i} className="flex gap-3 items-start">
              <FaCheckCircle className="text-red-600 text-2xl mt-1" />
              <p className="text-lg text-gray-700">{p}</p>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  );
};

export default WhyHSNSecurity;


```


</details>
</tool-use>

**Updating React Icons**

I'm looking at which icons from 'react-icons/fa' I should use. FaCheckCircle definitely exists, but I'm not so sure about FaBuildingShield. I think it was introduced in FontAwesome 6, so I might need to swap that out. Safe bet will be to stick with FaShieldAlt or FaBuilding instead. I’ll just go for FaShieldAlt since it’s available. 

So I'll import both FaCheckCircle and FaShieldAlt in the component and make those changes in the JSX. After that, I’ll need to run the installation command for react-icons. I'll use npm install react-icons in the terminal.**Updating Todo List and Tasks**

I need to update the todo list now. First, I'll mark 'Create page components' as completed. For 'Wire pages to components,' it seems that might already be done, but the earlier list shows that it wasn’t started—since we changed files, I should mark both as completed. The 'Test locally' step hasn't been started yet.

I need to call several tools in sequence, starting with a single preamble that explains what I'll be doing. I’ll say: "I'll fix the icon imports in `WhyHSNSecurity.jsx`, update the todo list, and install `react-icons`." 

Then, I’ll proceed to the apply_patch command to update the import line and change FaBuildingShield to FaShieldAlt. After that, I'll use the manage_todo_list tool to mark the relevant steps as completed. Finally, I’ll run the terminal command to install the `react-icons` package with a brief explanation. Sounds like a solid plan!I'll fix the icon imports in `WhyHSNSecurity.jsx`, update the todo list, and install `react-icons`.Done — progress update and next steps
